# removeChildCollections(at:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the child collections at the specified indexes from the collection list.

## Declaration

```swift
func removeChildCollections(at indexes: IndexSet)
```

## Parameters

- **indexes**: The indexes of the child collections to be removed from the collection list.

## Discussion

To ensure that the index set you specify is valid even if the collection list has changed since you fetched it, create a change request with a snapshot of the collection list’s contents using the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHCollectionListChangeRequest/init(for:childCollections:)] method before removing child collections. To remove objects based on their identities (without regard to their indexes in the collection), use the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHCollectionListChangeRequest/removeChildCollections(_:)] method.

## Managing Collections

- **addChildCollections(_:)**: Adds the specified collections as children of the collection list.
- **insertChildCollections(_:at:)**: Inserts the specified collections into the collection list at the specified indexes.
- **moveChildCollections(at:to:)**: Moves the child collections at the specified indexes in the collection list to a new index.
- **replaceChildCollections(at:withChildCollections:)**: Replaces the child collections at the specified indexes in the collection list with the specified collections.
- **removeChildCollections(_:)**: Removes the specified child collections from the collection list.
